author: Cortex XSOAR

commands.description: Generate the login url used for Authorization code flow.
commands.name: azure-nsg-generate-login-url

commands.description: Run this command to complete the authorization process. Should be used after running the azure-nsg-auth-start command.
commands.name: azure-nsg-auth-complete

commands.description: Tests the connectivity to the Azure Network Security Groups.
commands.name: azure-nsg-auth-test

commands.description: Update a security rule. If one does not exist, it will be created.
commands.name: azure-nsg-security-rule-update

commands.description: List all rules of the specified security groups.
commands.name: azure-nsg-security-rules-list

commands.description: Run this command to start the authorization process and follow the instructions in the command results.
commands.name: azure-nsg-auth-start

commands.description: Gets all resource groups for a subscription.
commands.name: azure-nsg-resource-group-list

commands.description: Gets all subscriptions for a tenant.
commands.name: azure-nsg-subscriptions-list

commands.description: Run this command if for some reason you need to rerun the authentication process.
commands.name: azure-nsg-auth-reset

integration.description: Azure network security groups are used to filter network traffic to and from Azure resources in an Azure virtual network.
integration.name: Azure Network Security Groups

description: Azure Network Security Groups are used to filter network traffic to and from Azure resources in an Azure virtual network
name: Azure Network Security Groups
